title: UAE weather forecast: Foggy mornings, rising humidity expected through Wednesday
summary_full: Humid weather is forecast for the UAE from Saturday to Wednesday, bringing a high chance of fog and mist during early mornings, especially in coastal and internal areas. Temperatures will see a slight dip on Sunday before rising again by Tuesday, with light to moderate winds. Motorists should exercise caution due to reduced visibility.
